Soya sauce 1/2 cup 

Packed dark brown sugar 2 tbsp 

Chopped garlic 1 clove 

Fresh ginger (peeled and chopped) 1/2-inch piece 

Corn flour 1-1/2 tsp 

Chicken drumsticks 1 kg 

Salt to taste 

Pepper to taste

1. Combine soya sauce, brown sugar, garlic, ginger and corn flour in a small saucepan. 

2. Add 2 tbsp water and bring to a boil over high heat, stirring constantly until thickened, about 2 minutes. 

3. Cool slightly and strain, discarding solids. 

4. Season drumsticks with salt and pepper on all sides. 

5. Pour sauce over and turn drumsticks several times to coat thoroughly. 

6. Let marinate for a while and then broil or grill or cook in a pan until chicken is browned and tender, you may need to add water a little at a time, so the sauce doesnâ€™t scorch. 

7. Teriyaki Chicken is ready to serve.
